content: knit flatten the foot - the garter stitch ridge determines the start of the row 26 decrease p2 p2tog four times - 12sts bottom of the foot row 28 decrease p1 p2tog four times - 8sts note you may wish to add a stitch or two into the centre of the foot and row 29 decrease k2tog four times - 4sts emerge it out at the back of the leg to hold the sole flat cut yarn thread end through all 4 left foot sole sts pull up tight to gather the sts secure the end baby rhino page 30 baby rhino page 31 right hind leg join seam with yarn a cast on 10 sts ws together fold the leg so that row ends meet use the end to row 1-8 beginning with a purl row work eight row stocking stitch mattress sew along row ends up to hind leg back cast-on edge leaving for right thigh row the thigh row unsewn for now row 9 increase cast on 10 sts for right hind leg back p20 - 20sts stuff the leg and foot lightly with yarn endings and a little toy filling row 10-17 work eight row stocking stitch flatten the foot - the garter stitch ridge determines the start of the bottom row 18 decrease k6 k2tog k1 k2tog k1 k2tog k6 to end - 17sts of the foot row 19 decrease p7 p3tog p7 to end - 15sts join forelegs and hind legs to the body row 20 knit making sure you have the correct leg for the correct side of the body the now work knit on the next row to create a garter stitch ridge just seam lies under the foreleg and at the back of the hind leg before the foot sole as follows foreleg - lay the shoulder row at the top of the foreleg onto the side of row 21 ws knit the body near the neck seam looking at the image for guidance see fig row 22 rs increase k5 kfb five times k5 to end - 20sts 19 cut yarn a join yarn b continue to work foot sole as follows carefully over sew around the shoulder so joining it to the body row 23 25 & 27 purl row 24 decrease k3 k2tog four times - 16sts hind leg - lay the thigh row at the top of the hind leg onto the side row 26 decrease k2 k2tog four times - 12sts of the body and pin to match the short row shaping at the thigh see fig row 28 decrease k1 k2tog four times - 8sts 19 row 29 decrease p2tog four times - 4sts stuff the legs and feet lightly with yarn endings plus a little toy filling if cut yarn thread end through all 4 right foot sole sts pull up tight you think it needs it flatten the sole with your fingers to shape to gather the sts secure the end carefully over-sew
